content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='I-D.adrangi-radius-bandwidth-capability'> <front> <title>Access Network Bandwidth Capability</title>  <author initials='F' surname='Adrangi' fullname='Farid Adrangi'>     <organization /> </author>  <date month='July' day='21' year='2004' />  <abstract><t>This document describes bandwidth profile parameters and a protocol framework that enables an AAA server to specify the parameters that should be allocated by the access network for duration of an authorized user session.</t></abstract>  </front>  <seriesInfo name='Internet-Draft' value='draft-adrangi-radius-bandwidth-capability-01' /> <format type='TXT'         target='http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-adrangi-radius-bandwidth-capability-01.txt' /> </reference>
